Sentence.value: It is especially important to practice the correct ways to: - Sit down to use the toilet and stand up after using the toilet - Get in and out of the shower - Use the shower chair - Go up and down stairs
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: It is especially important to practice the correct ways to: - Sit down to use the toilet and stand up after using the [[toilet|C0184958]] - Get in and out of the shower - Use the [[shower chair|C0179869]] - Go up and down stairs
